definitions.usage: 描述某人在做事时缺乏注意或谨慎，导致错误或疏忽。

examples.scene: 一个学生在考试中因为没有仔细检查答案，导致丢分。
examples.chineseIdea: 学生因为粗心，在试卷上犯了一些本可以避免的错误。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: She lost marks due to a @ @ she made in the exam.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: She lost marks due to a 「careless mistake」 she made in the exam.
examples.chineseTranslation: 她因为在考试中犯了一个「粗心的错误」而丢了分。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'She because not careful so made mistake.' 纠正：'She made a mistake because she was careless.'

examples.scene: 一个司机在开车时因为分心，差点撞到前面的车。
examples.chineseIdea: 司机没有专心开车，导致危险的行为。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: His @ @ nearly caused an accident on the highway.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: His 「careless driving」 nearly caused an accident on the highway.
examples.chineseTranslation: 他的「粗心驾驶」差点在高速公路上引发事故。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'He drive not careful so almost accident.' 纠正：'His careless driving almost caused an accident.'

definitions.usage: 描述某人对某事态度随意、不重视，或者缺乏关心。

examples.scene: 一个员工在会议中对项目提出不负责任的评论，显得不够重视。
examples.chineseIdea: 员工对工作表现出一种不认真的态度，让同事感到失望。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: His @ @ during the meeting upset his colleagues.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: His 「careless remark」 during the meeting upset his colleagues.
examples.chineseTranslation: 他在会议上的「漫不经心的评论」让同事们感到不安。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'He say something not serious in meeting.' 纠正：'His careless remark in the meeting was inappropriate.'

examples.scene: 一个学生在团队项目中敷衍了事，导致整个小组表现不佳。
examples.chineseIdea: 学生对团队任务不投入，态度显得随便。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The team failed because of her @ @ to the project.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The team failed because of her 「careless approach」 to the project.
examples.chineseTranslation: 团队因为她对项目的「漫不经心的态度」而失败了。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'She not serious to project so team fail.' 纠正：'Her careless approach to the project led to the team’s failure.'
